crICSKAT 0.1.0

    calcInfo.R

    calcInfo.Rd

    Calculate Fisher information matrix.

    calcInfo(
  leftDmat,
  rightDmat,
  gSummed,
  gMat = NULL,
  leftTimes,
  theta1,
  theta2,
  deltaVec
)

    Arguments

    leftDmat

    n*(p+nknots+2) design matrix for left end of interval.

    rightDmat

    n*(p+nknots+2) design matrix for right end of interval.

    gSummed

    n*1 vector of summed genotype matrix.

    gMat

    n*q genotype matrix (default is NULL).

    leftTimes

    n*1 vector of left side of interval times.

    theta1

    n*1 vector of fitted coefficient for cause 1.

    theta2

    n*1 vector of fitted coefficient for cause 2.

    deltaVec

    n*1 vector of the event cause (cause 1 or 2; or right-censored 0).

    Value

    A Fisher information matrix for model coefficients

    Examples

    seed <- 2022
n <- 1000
q <- 20
alpha1 <- -0.058
alpha2 <- -0.035
beta1 <- 0.03
beta2 <- log(1 - exp(beta1 / alpha1)) * alpha2
outcomeDat <- genData(seed=seed, n=n, alpha1=alpha1, alpha2=alpha2, beta1=beta1, beta2=beta2)
xMat <- matrix(data=rnorm(n), nrow=n)
gMat <- matrix(data=rbinom(n=n*q, size=2, prob=0.3), ncol=q)
gSummed <- matrix(data=apply(gMat, 1, sum), ncol=1)
obsTimes <- 1:5
lt <- outcomeDat$leftTimes
rt <- outcomeDat$rightTimes
obsInd <- outcomeDat$deltaVecSimple
dmats <- makeICdmat(xMat = xMat, lt = lt, rt = rt, obsInd = obsInd, quant_r = NULL, nKnots = 1)
iMatPartial <- calcInfo(leftDmat = dmats$left_dmat, rightDmat = dmats$right_dmat, leftTimes = lt,
theta1 = runif(4, 0.01, 0.02), theta2 = runif(5, 0.01, 0.02), deltaVec = outcomeDat$deltaVec,
gSummed=gSummed, gMat = NULL)
